Projects

AI/ML Projects

Virtual Control Using Hand Gestures

Implemented a real-time virtual control system using hand gestures via computer vision. Enabled control over system operations like volume, scrolling, and tab switching through camera input.

Multilingual Aspect-Based Sentiment Analysis

Built a sentiment analysis system capable of identifying sentiments related to specific aspects in multilingual product reviews using NLP techniques.

Full Stack Projects

Road Hazard Reporter

Built the frontend and backend for a road hazard detection platform. Handled user reporting, image uploads, and machine learning predictions with integrated database storage.

Sustainability / Innovation Projects

Portable Handwash Solution

Designed a compact and eco-friendly foaming handwash in 10ml/20ml bottles with customizable fragrances. Promoted hygiene on-the-go using refillable packaging.

Biodegradable Plates and Placemats

Developed eco-friendly plates and placemats using natural materials and textile waste. Focused on sustainable product development and rural use cases.

Localized Biogas Energy for Rural Communities

Created a portable biogas digester model for rural households. Designed a pay-per-use setup with smart monitoring for biogas and fertilizer generation from organic waste.
